title: 689: GLOBAL HASH WAR ‘WILL SEND BITCOIN TO $500K’, SAYS MAX KEISER!!!! BTC GOLDEN CROSS APPROACHING!!!!
description:
Bitcoin will soar to $500K because the US will start a war with Iran and Venezuela – of the hash-rate rather than the military variety – and the first salvoes may soon be fired, according to Bitcoin O.G. Max Keiser.

Max says bitcoin represents the “reformation of free speech,” something governments deny citizens by controlling the currency they use.

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit our YouTube channel at http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
